1.0.name: wordpress/ustream-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Ustream for WordPress is a plugin that enables the user to add tags on the format [ustream cid="xxxxx"] or [ustream vid="xxxxx"] in blog posts/pages and have them replaced by their video content from UStream.

This plugin automatically replaces the [ustream cid="xxxxx"] or [ustream vid="xxxxx"] tags with the embeded video related to the given cid or vid.

The [ustream cid="xxxxx"] tag is used when you want to tream a live broad cast and the [ustream vid="xxxxx"] is used when to publish a recorded video.
